Posts.EditableText:
Hi, just put up a new (short) game called "Jealousy".

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/qbxsavgsskketgicsyvpyw/jealousy

You play a psychiatrist who works with patients online using the Digital Psychiatric Treatment Network (DPTN) to conduct paid session. Do be careful though; the advice you dispense and your every word has implications. You can save lives... or lose them. 

(Interestingly, I wrote it in Ink (from Inkle) instead of Twine. I'm beginning to really like Ink. I'm a story teller primarily, and I found Twine less conducive to story telling when you're writing out the narrative. )

In any case, any feedback welcome!

Otherwise It was really fun!
